principal.title: Automatic News Site
principal.description: A beta version of a news portal built with ASP.NET Core 8, created to test a fully automated publishing workflow. Its purpose is to demonstrate that a fast, efficient, and reliable news site can operate with minimal human supervision, integrating webhooks, external services, and a smart editorial management system. This early phase focuses on optimizing the automated ingestion, cleaning, and distribution of news, paving the way for a more scalable and autonomous platform.

principal.title: News Scraper
principal.description: Python-based project focused on analysing and exploring linguistic trends in news articles. It applies natural language processing techniques using tools such as spaCy, BART, and Hugging Face to clean, summarise, and classify text in a structured way. The results are stored in MongoDB, enabling the study of topic evolution, sentiment dynamics, and vocabulary patterns over time. Its modular architecture allows easy system expansion and supports more advanced comparative analyses of language in the media.

principal.title: The Pokemon APP
principal.description: Pokémon-themed web app letting users explore, search, and view information about various Pokémon. It features components for displaying Pokémon cards, evolution details, and a chat assistant for interactive queries. The app includes a search engine, recently viewed tracking, and type-based color theming. It uses modern web technologies and delivers a visually engaging, interactive experience for Pokémon fans.
